#summary Texinfo to HLP How-To
#labels HowTo,HLP

These are the steps to make the files above:

* Get '''makertf''' (included in the [http://www.miktex.org/ MiKTeX] distribution) and invoke it as:  
  
  makertf --rtf --hpj ''name''.hpj ''name''.texi

* Compile the project using the [ftp://ftp.microsoft.com/Softlib/MSLFILES/HC505.EXE  Microsoft Windows Help Compiler].
